data.title: Dragons Fire by Anne Mccaffrey, First Edition
data.meta_description: Dragon's Fire a New Adventure of Pern by McCaffrey, Anne & Todd McCaffrey and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.co.uk.
data.text:
Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. First Edition; First Printing. This copy is either unread or read extremely carefully once; not price clipped; no handwriting such as names; ; 8vo 8" - 9" tall.

Hard Cover. Condition: Very Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good. First Edition. New York: Del Rey, 2006. First edition, first printing. 8vo. Hard cover binding, 366. Ex-library. Other than expected markings, book is in very good condition in a very good dust jacket, protected with an archival-quality mylar cover taped to boards. Size: 8vo. Ex-Library.

Hardcover w/DJ. Condition: Very Good/Very Good. Not Illustrated (illustrator). First Edition. New York, NY: Del Rey Books. Very Good/Very Good. 2006. First Edition. Hardcover w/DJ. 8vo., 366pp., Dust jacket light shelf wear on edges, and water spot on inside at spine panel; cover very good; pages clean and unmarked. .

Hardcover. Condition: Like New. Dust Jacket Condition: Like New. First Edition. First Edition, First Printing. Not price-clipped ($24.95 price intact). Published by Ballantine Books, 2006. Octavo. Black cloth over black boards stamped in gold. Book is like new; clean with no writing or names. Sharp corners and spine straight. Binding tight and pages crisp. Dust jacket is like new. 366 pages. ISBN: 9780345480286. 100% positive feedback. 30 day money back guarantee. NEXT DAY SHIPPING! Excellent customer service. Please email with any questions or if you would like a photo. All books packed carefully and ship with free delivery confirmation/tracking. All books come with free bookmarks. Ships from Southampton, New York.

Hardcover. First Edition; First Printing. Very Good in a Very Good dust jacket. Small stain to bottom page edges. ; The Dragonriders of Pern; 9.40 X 6 X 1.50 inches; 384 pages.

Hardcover. Condition: As New. 1st Edition. A very fine copy bound in full leather by The Easton Press. All edges gold gilt with silk moire endpapers. SIGNED LIMITED EDITION OF 900 NUMBERED COPIES. Certificate of Authenticity and Notes laid in. A very nice copy in like New Condition. = We ship all books with Delivery Confirmation. = We have been selling Used Books for over 31 years.
